headline: Equifax (NYSE:EFX) Shares Drop 13% Over Week As Governance Simplification Proposal Emerges
summary: Equifax (NYSE:EFX) experienced a 13% decline in its share price last week amid significant market turmoil and company-specific developments. The broader stock market saw a massive selloff, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq enduring sharp declines due to tariff tensions, which heavily impacted investor sentiment and overshadowed corporate news. During this period, Equifax's proposed amendments to simplify its governance structure might have also influenced its share price volatility. Additionally,...
